attributes.action: instruct Warwickshire County Council to improve their service for people with autism
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I have a relative, living in Warwickshire, who has an autistic child, the help available is woefully inadequate compared with that offered in other counties. It is hard enough coping with a child with autism, and doubly hard if you are unfortunate enough to live in a county who appear to be back in the dark ages where their attitude to disability is concerned!

reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
